sourcesContent:
<template>
  <st-panel>
    <st-form class="mg-t8" :form="form" labelWidth="125px">
      <discount-add
        v-model="info"
        :decorators="decorators"
        :form="form"
        @change="onChange"
        @submit="onSubmit"
      ></discount-add>
    </st-form>
  </st-panel>
</template>
<script>
import SeckillAdd from '../components#/seckill-add.vue'

import { AddService } from './add.service'
import { ruleOptions } from './add.config'
import { pick } from 'lodash'

export default {
  name: 'BrandAppPluginDiscountAdd',
  bem: {
    b: 'brand-app-plugin-discount-add'
  },
  components: {
    DiscountAdd
  },
  serviceInject() {
    return {
      service: AddService
    }
  },
  rxState() {
    return {
      loading: this.service.loading$
    }
  },
  data() {
    const form = this.$stForm.create()
    const decorators = form.decorators(ruleOptions)
    return {
      form,
      decorators,
      info: {
        product_name: '444',
        product_type: 3,
        product_id: '',
        limit_course_num: 0,
        discount_info: [], //product_sku_id  discount_price
        start_time: undefined,
        end_time: undefined,
        is_limit_stock: false,
        stock_num: 0,
        is_limit_buy: false,
        buy_num: 0,
        is_virtual_spike: false,
        virtual_spike_time: null,
        description: ''
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.$nextTick(() => {
      setTimeout(() => {
        console.log('page-add-set-info', { ...this.info })
        // this.form.setFieldsValue({
        //   info: this.info
        // })
      }, 2000)
    })
  },
  methods: {
    onChange(e) {
      console.log('info-change', e, { ...this.info })
    },
    // 保存
    onSubmit(e) {
      console.log('submit', { ...e }, { ...this.info })
    }
  }
}
</script>
